description:
Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le royaume en danger. L`ordre d`exécuter Neptune.
The Kingdom in Shock! An Order to Execute Neptune Issued!
Королевство в шоке! Приказ казнить Нептуна!
المملكة في صدمة! إصدار أمر إعدام نيبتون
王国激震 ネプチューン処刑指令
